reviews.text: Great "country style" junction station, especially because of the variety and frequency of trains both calling at and passing through.
Small village type station, clean and tidy, small cafe on middle platform and vending machines for snacks and drinks...

Excellent Service from the Ticket Office team on the 4th Aug. We had left a rucksack on the train en route to our holiday. They located it, had it taken off at Bristol and sorted us with connecting trains, so we could divert to pick it up, then carry on to our original destination. Big Thanks from 2 very grateful and appreciative customers!
Thank you to the gentlemen who helped us out following a horrific journey.  My husband has Dementia and was having real problems coping after an awful journey.  Thank you SO  much
Parking increased to £4per day....now its better to park in town and walk.....when will they ever realise that this puts people off using the train....
